title: Add missing Toiletries category to Store Home categories

requirements.summary: Add the missing “Toiletries” category to the Store Home “Shop by Category” grid and ensure user-facing spelling is exactly “Toiletries”.
acceptanceCriteria: On the Store Home page, the "Shop by Category" grid includes a category labeled "Toiletries".
The new category renders consistently with existing category cards (icon + name + item count) and does not break the grid layout on mobile and desktop.

file_operations.description: Update the StoreHome categories list to include a new category object with name exactly "Toiletries" (fix any existing misspelling if present), with an icon and item count consistent with other entries. Ensure it renders through the existing shadcn/ui Card-based category card mapping so the grid layout and styling remain unchanged across breakpoints. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
